name: Nice List - Little Miss Sunshine ReMix Tunic - Size 7/8 (Euro 122/128) - INSTOCK & Ready to Ship
description:
My Beautiful Girl is now offering Re-Mix pieces... aka upcycles! My kids LOVE these pieces and I hope yours will too. Each shirt, hoodie, dress or skirt is OOAK. I take a licensed tee (vintage and new) featuring your favorite characters, add stripes, dots and prints to best coordinate and viola... a whole new piece that is full of sass and character!

As with all MBG clothing, all seams and hems are professionally finished and each piece has brand and size tags sewn into the neckline. This shirt features a fun vintage style Little Miss Sunshine Shirt in a Christmas theme and a fun eclectic mix of fabrics on the sleeves. 

Nice List, Size 7/8 (122/128 Euro) 
Chest 13" (pit to pit) 
Length 21" (back of neck to hem) 
Sleeve 17" (top of shoulder to cuff)

***************************** 
My Beautiful Girl Re-Mixed dresses, shirts and hoodies may feature trademarked characters and licensed tees and fabrics that have been purchased and then Re-Mixed into new pieces by me. My Beautiful Girl has no affiliation with the original trademark holders. Our finished dresses, tees & hoodies are not officially licensed or endorsed by any company or entity other than My Beautiful Girl.
